trans-unit.source: Defines the different language versions of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 定义其他语言版本的公历。

trans-unit.source: The date and time patterns associated with the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> vary depending on the language.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的日期和时间模式<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>语言而异。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> is selected in <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, GregorianCalendarTypes can be used to specify which date and time patterns to use in that <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>选择中<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，可以用 GregorianCalendarTypes 来指定要在中使用该<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>。</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>的日期和时间模式</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: For Arabic cultures, more language versions of the Gregorian calendar are available.
trans-unit.target: 为了 Arabic 区域性中，提供了多个语言版本的公历。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the French version of <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> using the MiddleEastFrench value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用法语版的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>使用 MiddleEastFrench 值。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: A culture that supports <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> might not support all language versions of <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>.
trans-unit.target: 区域性的支持<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>可能不支持的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>.</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>所有语言版本</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties specify the calendars supported by that culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性指定支持该区域性的日历。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> is supported, <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.CalendarType%2A> can be used to determine which language versions of <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> are supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>支持，则<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.CalendarType%2A>可以用于确定哪些语言版本的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>支持。</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> </xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.CalendarType%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: Refers to the Arabic version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 引用 Arabic 版本的公历。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the localized version of the Gregorian calendar, based on the language of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that uses the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 引用公历，基于<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo></xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>的语言的本地化版本

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the Middle East French version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 引用中东法语版本的公历。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the transliterated English version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 是指已转译的英语版本的公历。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the transliterated French version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 指转译法语版的公历。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Refers to the U.S. English version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 指的是美国英语版本的公历。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
